task.title: How to Watch a Stream
task.shortdesc: Here you will learn how to watch a stream in Discord.

taskbody.prereq: To be able to watch a stream, you need to join a voice channel and someone to share their screen.

context.p: Discord allows you to watch other people's streams - it is helpful when you need to see something.

step.cmd: Click on the red Live icon.
Click on the Watch Stream button.

taskbody.result: You are now watching someone's stream.
